actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1682a of title 38, United States Code, to eliminate the State matching requirement under such section in connection with the program of accelerated payment of educational assistance allowances and for other purposes.
short_title: GI Bill Accelerated Loan Payment Improvement Act

summary.text: GI Bill Accelerated Loan Payment Improvement Act - Eliminates the requirement that States have a program of matching the Federal amounts of veterans' accelerated educational assistance payments in order for a veteran to be eligible for such accelerated payments. Increases the rate at which such accelerated assistance payments may be paid per school term.

titles.title: GI Bill Accelerated Loan Payment Improvement Act

A bill to amend section 1682a of title 38, United States Code, to eliminate the State matching requirement under such section in connection with the program of accelerated payment of educational assistance allowances and for other purposes.
